title: Henry Liem Sell Shares of Argha Karya Prima Ind. Tbk
body: Henry Liem sold 500 shares of Argha Karya Prima Ind. Tbk (AKPI.JK) at a price of IDR 580 per share. This transaction reduces his total holdings from 15,681,559 shares to 15,681,059 shares. The purpose of the transaction was to sell shares.

title: Garret Suryowijoyo Kartono Buys Shares of PT Maxindo Karya Anugerah Tbk
body: Garret Suryowijoyo Kartono acquired 27,993,400 shares of PT Maxindo Karya Anugerah Tbk for investment purposes. This transaction increases his holdings from 0 to 27,993,400 shares. The most recent purchase was on November 20, 2025, at IDR 50.0 per share.
